after 3k hours in this game let me tell you something

negative apsects
- with every patch there comes new bugs, when you find them out then you can get banned for using them and probably map will go down for weeks
- to much smurfs so absolute no chance to play this game in ranked
- deleted overwatch 1 with promises for pve content in overwatch 2. after like a half year they delay pve content, after 8 monts they cancel the pve content so the name of overwatch 2 is totaly useless.
- made the game f2p so there are a lot more cheater now and literally everyone has like 2-3 accounts
- balancing is so bad that people still dont understand WHY THE F..K they change something ... probably to try to keep people playing this sh..ty game
- another reason for f2p is monitarization ... pay pay pay but hey its free to play so this is the probably the only reason why they did overwatch 2 f2p and deletes overwatch 1
- now they sell pve that allready existed on the blizzcon for 15 bucks
- original overwatch 1 were 60 dollars for 6 years now they make with bp 60 in one year. and giving you just some trash for your money. chance to get bp for free? np just play 17 weeks to get 1 bp for free.
- after they saw that playerbase going away from overwatch 2 they try now on steam. working on their game? nah better we try to get all the money out of the wallet from players wihtout chance to get something for it.
- 25$ for one skin? but hey JUST FOR YOU AND FOR SHORT TIME we give you discount of 10-50%. kinda strange that every skin has a discount. 
- totaly agressiv and manipulativ monitarization. 
- this game will die also like overwatch 1
- for beginners they made 50 wins in quickplay, after this theyre going to play ranked, ruin for some people who really try to up their rank the whole game.
- nearly every game you will read at the end of the game "gg ez" "thx for warmup" "tank/dps/heal diff" "uninstall this game" and and and
- very much leaver in the middle of game there are in my opinion 2 reasons 1. billzard server has some bug cause indie company cant fix it 2. players are frustrated that they dont dominating the enemies so they leave on purpose cause "hey f..k this ban time"
- because of low player range you will meet like 4-5 times the same people in a day

now the positiv apsect
+ the negative comments are very funny in steam. recomend you to read them
+ microsoft bought actiblizzard so i hope they will fix the core problem of this company
+ people getting smart "not like me" and leaving this game.

so my fact ... dont play this game, even golum-game is more worth to play then this. you wont play this long. i really hope that microsoft will fix the company but the hope fading every day. I beg you safe your money and the money of your parents and buy you something usefull for it, like ice cream or something

不再是了

TL;DR if you enjoyed other team based shooters, you'll probably like this one too - just beware of scummy developer slapping its players in the face repeatedly.

Before you skip this review as another TF2 player hating on its competitor - I bought the original OW back in 2017 and spent quite a lot of time playing it (110-odd profile levels, you do the math how many hours is that).

Was it enjoyable back then? Yes.

Is it enjoyable now? No. Hell, I'll even admit that I didn't play OW2 and still feel ripped of by Blizzard. I want my money for buying first OW back.

After watching all the crap fest and dramas surrounding the brand and this "sequel" (attempts to make OW the next big multiplayer shooter since CS, renaming McCree to whatever he's currently named as well as switching one of his sprays because some black NASCAR racer got scared of a garage door handle, forcing everyone from OW to switch OW2, reducing team size to 5 players because "muh imbalanced 2 assault-2 tank-2 support teams are too strong", promising PvE mode and later dropping it entirely, predatory microtransactions, pandering to the alphabet people more than focusing on gameplay balance, the infamous diversity measurement tool, etc.) I cannot give a positive remark on this title appearing on Steam.

It's a shooter, who cares if Tracer is lesbian, Reaper is gay, and Echo identifies as assault chopper? What value it gives to gameplay? Those are just dumb attempts at staying relevant. At best the game will flop spectacularly (as of now, 11th August 2023, only 13% of over 30k reviews are positive) and fall off the grid very soon.

If you want to give it a shot, go ahead - you'll most likely meet the usual cast of chill and toxic players you can find anywhere else. But don't expect the dev will listen to the player base's suggestions in the future.

鲍勃考迪克必须死

А что старики то ноют?
1) Да недоступно в России, что вам мешает запустить один раз впн и загрузить игру? Впн даже не понадобится чтобы играть в будущем.
2) Да платное пве, а оно вам жизненно необходимо нужно было?
3) Да в игре убрали лутбоксы и вся косметика донатная - Вы пришли играть или дрочить на скины которые можете увидеть только при выборе персонажей да в меню?
4)Да это та же игра которой была первая часть. Ну потеряли вы все свои легендарные пиксели. Ну не можете вернуть ту пару касарей, а с 2019 года жалкие 999 рублей за игру 2016 года выхода. Вы за эти 7 лет могли заработать в сто раз больше денег чем потратили.
А те кто играли в Tf2 и советуют её, нежели эту игру от конторы пидарасов, вы видели что вообще в ней происходит последние несколько лет? Боты, аутисты которые вместо игры включают соундпад или танцуют всю игру и донатное оружие, которое имеет СВОИ ХАРАКТЕРИСТИКИ и которое меняет геймлей практически полностью, то есть рядовой новичок увидевший эту игру, просто удалит её спустя час. Да, в далёкий 2016 год, когда я только знакомился с ней, tf2 ещё была играбельна и очень хороша, но если бы мне дали выбор между этими играми, то я бы выбрал помойку от конторы пидарасов с лгбт мужиками и вуменами, чем "умирающий" симулятор покупки оружия с ботами.
